document.full_text: muhammad farooq waits by his truck outside the pakistani border town of chaman, the main crossing into southern afghanistan. he has driven several hundred kilometers from the port city of karachi carrying supplies for nato forces, along with a couple of dozen other tankers and trucks.
document.title: is it worth it? pakistan, u.s. weigh aid calculus
lines_and_colors: muhammad farooq waits by his truck outside the pakistani border town of chaman, the main crossing into southern afghanistan. he has driven several hundred kilometers from the port city of karachi carrying supplies for nato forces, along with a couple of dozen other tankers and trucks.
